Description: Ostracon, fragment of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a red slip and faint traces of seven lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394387) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394387)
